Protocols/CameraEventListener.html#/c:@M.name: onPreviewFrame(sampleBuffer:)
Protocols/CameraEventListener.html#/c:@M.abstract: Provides the sample buffer of the camera preview feed

Protocols/CameraEventListener.html#/c:@M.name: onCapture(imageData:)
Protocols/CameraEventListener.html#/c:@M.abstract: Provides the image output of the photo capture.

Protocols/CameraEventListener.html#/c:@M.name: onCameraInitialized()
Protocols/CameraEventListener.html#/c:@M.abstract: Called when the camera initialization has finished

Protocols/CameraEventListener.html#/c:@M.name: onCameraPermissionDenied()
Protocols/CameraEventListener.html#/c:@M.abstract: If the user has denied the camera access permission and the SDK was unable to request the permission, this event will be called

Protocols/CameraEventListener.html.name: CameraEventListener
Protocols/CameraEventListener.html.abstract: Public event listener for camera callbacks, such as preview frames, photo capture and initialization

Extensions/CMSampleBuffer.html#/s:So17CM.name: bufferToData(ciContext:jpegCompression:)
Extensions/CMSampleBuffer.html#/s:So17CM.abstract: Converts the samplebuffer to a Data object

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: savePhotoToLibrary()
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Saves the image to photos library. Requires NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription declaration in Info.plist file.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: savePhotoToFiles(fileName:)
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Saves the image data to the app file directory. Returns the final absolute path to the file as String

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: imageDataToBytes()
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Converts a Data object to UInt8 byte array

Classes/CameraSession.html#/s:19PharmaLe.name: init(cameraEventListener:)
Classes/CameraSession.html#/s:19PharmaLe.abstract: Initialisation of the CameraSession. Attempts to configure the session session with default CameraConfiguration and starts it if successfull

Classes/CameraSession.html#/s:19PharmaLe.name: init(cameraEventListener:cameraConfiguration:)
Classes/CameraSession.html#/s:19PharmaLe.abstract: Initialisation of the CameraSession using custom launch configurations.

Classes/CameraSession.html#/c:@M@PharmaL.name: getPhotoOutput()
Classes/CameraSession.html#/c:@M@PharmaL.abstract: returns the photoOutput for custom takePicture implementation

Classes/CameraSession.html#/s:19PharmaLe.name: getConfig()
Classes/CameraSession.html#/s:19PharmaLe.abstract: Returns the current configuration object of the camera

Classes/CameraSession.html#/s:19PharmaLe.name: getCurrentColorSpaceString()
Classes/CameraSession.html#/s:19PharmaLe.abstract: Get the current active color space in String format

Classes/CameraSession.html#/c:@M@PharmaL.name: updateOrientation()
Classes/CameraSession.html#/c:@M@PharmaL.abstract: Requests to update the camera orientation based on the current UIDevice orientation

Classes/CameraSession.html#/s:19PharmaLe.name: setOrientation(orientation:)
Classes/CameraSession.html#/s:19PharmaLe.abstract: Sets the camera session video orientation to the desired value

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: initOrientation
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Predefines the orientation when initializing the camera (available values are “landscapeRight”, “landscapeLeft” and “portrait”).

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: supportedAspectRatios
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: List of supported aspect ratios. 16/9 || 4/3 || 11/9

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: autoOrientationEnabled
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: If true, the CameraSession will monitor device orientation changes and automatically swap the camera preview and photo capture orientation between “portrait”, “landscapeLeft” and “landscapeRight”

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: continuousFocus
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Defines the preferred AVCaptureDevice.FocusMode.

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: highResolutionCaptureEnabled
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: If high resolution is enabled, the photo capture will be taken with the highest possible resolution available. Default: true

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: init()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Initializes the camera confifugration with default values. To further customize the configuration, call any

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: init(flash_mode:color_space:session_preset:device_types:camera_position:continuous_focus:highResolutionCaptureEnabled:auto_orientation_enabled:init_orientation:)
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Initialize the camera session with customizable configurations. Parameters that don’t need to be configured can be left as nil.

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: applyConfiguration()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Applies the configurations to the current AVCaptureSession. This should be executed each time the configurations are changed during session runtime.

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: toDict()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Conversion to dictionary

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: createFromConfig(configDict:)
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Creates configuration instance from a dictionary

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: getTorchMode()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Returns the current torch mode in AVCaptureDevice.TorchMode format

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: getFlashConfiguration()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Returns the current flash and torch mode in String format

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: getFlashMode()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Returns the current torch mode in AVCaptureDevice.FlashMode format to be used with the photo capture

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: getTorchLevel()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Get the current torch level

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: setFlashConfiguration(flash_mode:)
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Sets the camera torch and flash mode

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: setTorchLevel(level:)
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Sets the torch level

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: getPreferredColorSpace()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Gets the current preference for color space as AVCaptureColorSpace enum value.

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: getPreferredColorSpaceString()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Gets the current preference for color space as String.

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: setPreferredColorSpace(color_space:)
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Sets the preferred color space.

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: setAspectRatio(aspectRatio:)
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Sets the desired aspect ratio. If an unsupported aspect ratio is given, the closest possible aspect ratio will be selected

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: setSessionPreset(preset:)
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Sets the session preset

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: getSessionPresetString()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Returns the current session preset

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: getSessionPreset()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Returns the current session preset

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: getAspectRatio()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Get the current configuration aspect ratio

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: setDeviceTypes(deviceTypes:)
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Sets the device type criteria for the device discovery session

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: getDeviceTypes()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Gets the current device type criteria used for device discovery

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: getDeviceTypeStrings()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Gets the current device type criteria used for device discovery

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: setCameraPosition(position:)
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Sets the camera position.

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: getCameraPosition()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Gets the current camera position.

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.name: getCameraPositionString()
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html#/s:19Ph.abstract: Gets the current camera position.

Classes/CameraConfiguration.html.name: CameraConfiguration
Classes/CameraConfiguration.html.abstract: CameraConfiguration class that contains all the necessary configurations for the camera

Classes/CameraSession.html.name: CameraSession
Classes/CameraSession.html.abstract: Camera session handler that provides streamlined access to functionalities such as preview frame callbacks, photo capture and camera configurations
